On a [Perfect Hit], the monster suffers a wound.

Earl Jaw Guard.crafting: x1 Iron, x2 Bone, x1 Organ
abilities: {green_puzzle}: Your [Encourage] affects all knocked down survivors.
If 3 or more of your attack rolls hit, remove a token from the monster before drawing {hit_location}.
If another survivor would collide with you due to knockback, instead end their knockback and place them standing in the nearest unoccupied space to you.
Ignore severe injuries to the arms location.
On arrival, gain +1 strength token and draw 1 tactics card.
On arrival, all survivors gain +3 survival.
{activation}: Roll 1d10. On a 8+, remove 1 token from the monster.

You may [Concentrate]. If you do, spend {activation} to perform an attack with this weapon at the start of your next act (if a monster is within reach) that ignores [Impervious] and [Parry]. This gear cannot be activated any other way.
When you critically wound with this, archive all tokens the monster has and inflict an additional wound for each.
At the end of your attack, if you wounded the monster, roll 1d10. On a 7+, gain the [Priority Target] token.
When you attack, if you are within 3 spaces of the monster, you may hit once automatically instead of making any attack rolls.
When you wound the monster, it gains a -1 evasion token. Limit once per round.
{activation}: One of your or an adjacent survivor's weapons gains [Sharp] and [Deadly] 2 until the end of the round. Limit once per round.
